page.title: 18ROADS TO AND FROM HORNSEA
page.content: The children from 5.G. of Hornsea Primary School conducted a survey of the four roads that lead into and out of the town. During our survey period we found the B1242 leading towards Bridlington was the busiest with an average of 11 vehicles a minute using it. This may be because it was the holiday season and people were coming from Bridlington to visit Hornsea Pottery. We expected the Hull Road to be busy but during our survey period only an average of 4 vehicles per minute were using it. It would be probably busier in the early morning and late afternoon when people would be travelling to and from work in Hull. The roads leading to Beverley and Withernsea had an average of 7 vehicles per minute using them. DANIEL HACKNEY 5.G.
